text: Hey all :corgi-wave:  we just pushed out a new major version of the boilerplate that includes new features such as style fields, sections, updated fields/field layout for theme settings, and a more accessible menu module. For more details about each of these changes, please check out the release notes here ((<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/releases/tag/v3.0.0>).
